# selectedDates

**Instance Property**

An array of date component objects that represent selected dates in a calendar view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedDates: [DateComponents] { get set }
```

## Updating the selected dates

- **setSelectedDates(_:animated:)**: Updates the array of date component objects that represent selected dates in a calendar view, with an option to animate the change.
